tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE pharmaceutical_patents (
    patent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_name VARCHAR(255),
    owner_id INT,
    owner_name VARCHAR(255),
    acquisition_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patent_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_id INT,
    old_owner_id INT,
    new_owner_id INT,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE patent_transfers (
  transfer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patent_id UUID,
  previous_owner_id UUID,
  new_owner_id UUID,
  transfer_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patent_ownership (
  patent_id INT,
  owner_id INT,
  acquisition_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE patent_transfer (
  transfer_id INT,
  patent_id INT,
  old_owner_id INT,
  new_owner_id INT,
  transfer_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE patent_acquisition (
  acquisition_id INT,
  patent_id INT,
  acquiring_company_id INT,
  acquisition_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE patent_company (
  company_id INT,
  company_name VARCHAR,
  company_country VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE patent (
  patent_id INT,
  patent_name VARCHAR,
  patent_description TEXT,
  patent_type VARCHAR
)
